Your faith enhances your ability to remove conditions.

When you use @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Mercy]{Mercy}, you can instead attempt to counteract the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened}, or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed} conditions.
